description: InstaFit is an online fitness and nutritional coaching platform that develops, markets and sells monthly subscriptions to a proprietary, web-based and mobile app program that combines technology with personal human follow-up and support.
InstaShop is a homegrown marketplace on-demand delivery app.
Intelipost is a SaaS company providing transportation management and tech-enabled delivery solutions to more than 10K+ retailers and 400+ carriers throughout Brazil.
IMS is a media and marketing company that partners with fast-moving businesses seeking to expand into Latin America or grow within the region.
Intizen provides unique tea blends with a Latin touch.

Inveko collects used cooking oil (UCO) from restaurants and hotels, which it filters, treats, and resells to biodiesel manufacturers – eliminating waste, reducing CO2 emissions and generating clean energy.
Investree is Indonesia’s leading B2B marketplace lending platform for SMEs, providing them with access to working capital solutions from retail and institutional lenders.
InvGate provides enterprises with IT support to improve efficiency and customer experience.
Involves is a Brazilian SaaS company that improves field team productivity and retail execution for CPG brands.

description: International Power Supply (IPS) specializes in the R&D and precision manufacturing of power electronics and energy conversion technologies, including the world’s first modular off-grid system, Exeron.

IrisGuard is a payment processing platform that allows millions of unbanked beneficiaries to receive cash and non-food items using only their iris, ensuring full proof of delivery for donors and protection of entitlement for beneficiaries.
Ironhack is an international tech and design school that believes the best way to learn how to do something, is by actually doing it.
IsoMetrix develops integrated risk and compliance management software solutions for EHS, GRC and sustainability experts.
IST’s omnichannel contact center solutions integrate clients’ back-office systems with all major modern communication channels (phone, email, mobile, video, and social media).
iVisa is a third-party visa processor that simplifies the process of applying for a visa, saving foreign travelers time and frustration.
Iyzico is a Turkish fintech company which focuses on payment systems. Iyzico was acquired by fintech giant PayU in 2019.
Jamalon an online Arabic book retailer and web-based electronic publishing house, offering more than 12 million Arabic and English titles.
Jampp helps mobile app-driven companies drive large volumes of high-quality mobile users to their apps in a simple and cost-effective way. Jampp was acquired in 2021.
Javara brings the best heritage food biodiversity products that are regionally specific from across Indonesia to the global market.
Jeff provides a “business in a box” solution to entrepreneurs, creating the first omnichannel ecosystem of services for day-to-day needs such as laundry, beauty salons, gyms, and massage centers.
